pages.body:
# List of Game-oriented Zites 

- [A Random Zombie Survival Text Adventure](/1HjQ6RigqTp4wT3zbsXuLCXJMRPQRr3ei6/): Mud-style zombie survival game based on DayZ Chernarus map.

- [Candy Box 2](/13E8MVCj4uXanuWqXhvKaQ99MaDA5NNwp5/): AsciiArt RPG [Save feature does not work. So do not reload page while playing.]

- [Dyna Blaster ](/13N5YfLJu3mN4y3JnXuqj9ZJb2mnTzpRye/): Bomberman (1990 video game)

- [Flappy Bird](/1PANDAML8mLaRKPinGihTj5RkJV15awcjs/): version easy with a fly panda

- [Flappy Bird](/16nsEmQ1ErcdNRpe7zmSg5eF2Y1zQpuURp/): version original and hard to play

- [Hugo's House of Horrors](/1CpSYx9sBwxZKyzszBQQSq3uZhfNwZ4Ury/): classic 1990 parser-based graphic adventure game (similar to *Maniac Mansion*)

- [Game of Life](/19TrFbEUS1mdznSX24FqnxZgftzNpxCXv8): Conway's Game of Life (very simple edition)

- [maggiesDigger EIS-2.0](/1F8cFAxjLDXzHBnpJ8ZhgnVbCxE7zhATs4/): Digger and Alley Cat classic games from 1983

- [Pac man](/14Q1So3DH9qvHts5VuLDgqGp7yCXceujop/): pac man in original version

- [phi](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1EGGj9r2NsBue1ozfEoM3cUVuLqvABxJ5T/): [n game](http://www.thewayoftheninja.org/nv2.html) javascript equivalent

- [Prehistorik 2](/1BbFE1xH5S7ZM6itCb2PaN6iNPagW81ZbE): a simple platform game where the player walks and jumps his/her way through the levels and whacks enemies in the head with a club

- [Snake](/1JsJ1JitaLboc8pvo4fxh9dvP8mt6toPrE/): snake hard to play

- [SimCity](/13ozLST1c4rqUjCNLg1YFGWnYVVfPsVqnV): a city-building simulation game from 1989

- [Taxi Drift](/1EzPDDHciaG9AH4ErxsmAKsF4hsrJPktiM/): find customers and drive them to their destination

- [The Robbery](/14zQjCbU2BAy3uAUAXN5UJhq8YdAHyzUqK/the-robbery/index.html): Use the arrow keys to get as many coins as possible

- [TypinMaster](/1KNvxg3ww7ZLxZRPT8MX4tRcFxwGhWRRK3/): a touch typing game

- [Zarcade](/1EwpsssQGBrC2EZeYvxeQQoQbKNGivwDi4/): arcade games to play in the browser

- [ZeroSudoku](/16Gn4QBd8iXFnDcVEcsmYw8soBKCeBezzS): a HTML5 version of the well-known game of Sudoku

- [Solitaire](/ajsantos.bit/solitaire.html): a basic DHTML version of Solitaire

* [ZeroWiki PL](http://127.0.0.1:43110/12Tt38zRJefsRMnAC9iai1CMSZ3PfiBDuY) - Polish ZeroWiki, klon w języku polskim

* [ZeroWiki PT](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1QJ8rDLmn4CE2VXpMotAi7bDryRmNLM7Rm/) - Portuguese ZeroWiki, mostly in Brazilian Portuguese (ZeroWiki em Português, mais em PT-BR)

* [BitcoinWiki EN](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Pqq7TeAyCdVDqm2EN6PE9QVKHawzWyFmc) BitcoinWiki

# List of Zites: Social

* [ZeroMe](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/) - P2P Social Network
* [ZeroMe+](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Lj1oPcN7oZQL8HkS5KbkzQuKqs42zQWY6) - P2P Social Network

#Magnet Links

'Magnet links' are strings of text you paste into a [[torrent client]] to find and download torrents from [[peers]].
You can find Magnet Links for [[torrent]]s on most torrent websites, ie. [[The Pirate Bay]]
